verses.verse: Who <S%H4310><s%> is <S%H2088>this<s%> that <S%H935>cometh<s%> from <S%H4480>Edom,<s%> <S%H123><s%> with <S%H2556>dyed<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> from <S%H4480>Bozrah?<s%> <S%H1224><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> that is <S%H1921>glorious<s%> in his <S%H3830>apparel,<s%> <S%H6808>traveling<s%> in the <S%H7230>greatness<s%> of his <S%H3581>strength?<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> that <S%H1696>speak<s%> in <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> <S%H7227>mighty<s%> to <S%H3467>save.<s%>
Wherefore <S%H4069><s%> art thou <S%H122>red<s%> in thine <S%H3830>apparel,<s%> and thy <S%H899>garments<s%> like him that <S%H1869>treadeth<s%> in the wine <S%H1660>vat?<s%>

I have <S%H1869>trodden<s%> the <S%H6333>winepress<s%> <S%H905>alone;<s%> and of the <S%H4480>people<s%> <S%H5971><s%> there was <S%H369>none<s%> <S%H376><s%> <S%H854>with<s%> me: for I will <S%H1869>tread<s%> them in mine <S%H639>anger,<s%> and <S%H7429>trample<s%> them in my <S%H2534>fury;<s%> and their <S%H5332>blood<s%> shall be <S%H5137>sprinkled<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> my <S%H899>garments,<s%> and I will <S%H1351>stain<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H4403>raiment.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H5359>vengeance<s%> is in mine <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and the <S%H8141>year<s%> of my <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> is <S%H935>come.<s%>

And I <S%H5027>looked,<s%> and there was <S%H369>none<s%> to <S%H5826>help;<s%> and I <S%H8074>wondered<s%> that there was <S%H369>none<s%> to <S%H5564>uphold:<s%> therefore mine own <S%H2220>arm<s%> brought <S%H3467>salvation<s%> unto me; and my <S%H2534>fury,<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> <S%H5564>upheld<s%> me.

And I will tread <S%H947>down<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> in mine <S%H639>anger,<s%> and make them <S%H7937>drunk<s%> in my <S%H2534>fury,<s%> and I will bring <S%H3381>down<s%> their <S%H5332>strength<s%> to the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

I will <S%H2142>mention<s%> the <S%H2617>lovingkindnesses<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and the <S%H8416>praises<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H5921>according<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H1580>bestowed<s%> on us, and the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H2898>goodness<s%> toward the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he hath <S%H1580>bestowed<s%> on them according to his <S%H7356>mercies,<s%> and according to the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of his <S%H2617>lovingkindnesses.<s%>

For he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H389>Surely<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> are my <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%> that will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8266>lie:<s%> so he <S%H1961>was<s%> their <S%H3467>Savior.<s%>

In <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H6869>affliction<s%> he was <S%H6862>afflicted,<s%> and the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of his <S%H6440>presence<s%> <S%H3467>saved<s%> them: in his <S%H160>love<s%> and in his <S%H2551>pity<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> them; and he <S%H5190>bore<s%> them, and <S%H5375>carried<s%> them <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5769>old.<s%>

But <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H4784>rebelled,<s%> and <S%H6087>vexed<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H6944>Holy<s%> <S%H7307>Spirit:<s%> therefore he was <S%H2015>turned<s%> to be their <S%H341>enemy,<s%> and <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H3898>fought<s%> against them.

Then he <S%H2142>remembered<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5769>old,<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and his <S%H5971>people,<s%> saying, <S%H346>Where<s%> is he that brought them <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H4480>sea<s%> <S%H3220><s%> <S%H854>with<s%> the <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> of his <S%H6629>flock?<s%> <S%H346>where<s%> is he that <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H6944>Holy<s%> <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> him?

That <S%H1980>led<s%> them by the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%> with his <S%H8597>glorious<s%> <S%H2220>arm,<s%> <S%H1234>dividing<s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> them, to <S%H6213>make<s%> himself an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H8034>name?<s%>
That <S%H1980>led<s%> them through the <S%H8415>deep,<s%> as a <S%H5483>horse<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> that they should <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3782>stumble?<s%>

As a <S%H929>beast<s%> goeth <S%H3381>down<s%> into the <S%H1237>valley,<s%> the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> caused him to <S%H5117>rest:<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> didst thou <S%H5090>lead<s%> thy <S%H5971>people,<s%> to <S%H6213>make<s%> thyself a <S%H8597>glorious<s%> <S%H8034>name.<s%>

Look <S%H5027>down<s%> from <S%H4480>heaven,<s%> <S%H8064><s%> and <S%H7200>behold<s%> from the <S%H4480>habitation<s%> <S%H2073><s%> of thy <S%H6944>holiness<s%> and of thy <S%H8597>glory:<s%> <S%H346>where<s%> is thy <S%H7068>zeal<s%> and thy <S%H1369>strength,<s%> the <S%H1995>sounding<s%> of thy <S%H4578>bowels<s%> and of thy <S%H7356>mercies<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> me? are they <S%H662>restrained?<s%>

Doubtless <S%H3588><s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> art our <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> be <S%H3808>ignorant<s%> <S%H3045><s%> of us, and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5234>acknowledge<s%> us <S%H3808>not:<s%> <S%H859>thou,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> art our <S%H1>father,<s%> our <S%H1350>redeemer;<s%> thy <S%H8034>name<s%> is from <S%H4480>everlasting.<s%> <S%H5769><s%>

O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H4100>why<s%> hast thou made us to <S%H8582>err<s%> from thy <S%H4480>ways,<s%> <S%H1870><s%> and <S%H7188>hardened<s%> our <S%H3820>heart<s%> from thy <S%H4480>fear?<s%> <S%H3374><s%> <S%H7725>Return<s%> for thy servants' <S%H4616>sake,<s%> <S%H5650><s%> the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of thine <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>

The <S%H5971>people<s%> of thy <S%H6944>holiness<s%> have <S%H3423>possessed<s%> it but a little <S%H4705>while:<s%> our <S%H6862>adversaries<s%> have trodden <S%H947>down<s%> thy <S%H4720>sanctuary.<s%>

We <S%H1961>are<s%> thine: thou <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5769><s%> didst bear <S%H4910>rule<s%> over them; they were <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> thy <S%H8034>name.<s%>
